text: @RandPaul Hey homeless hobo. Your attack Obama strategy is not working with 60% of critical thinkers. GOP needs to face Covid19 health crisis, upcoming tsunami financial crisis head on. DJT has not implemented mass testing, contact tracking, effective PPE supply chain. DJT is total failure

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
